cartaPolicy.bookingGuidance: Book all international travel through Navan (TripActions). Direct bookings require manager approval and may not be reimbursed.
cartaPolicy.approvalWorkflow: International trips require manager approval 14+ days in advance. Executive-level trips (C-suite meetings) require VP approval.
cartaPolicy.expensePolicy: Per diem rates apply based on destination. See Carta Travel Policy for daily limits. Premium economy approved for flights over 6 hours.
cartaPolicy.travelInsurance: All international travel is automatically covered under Carta's corporate travel insurance. Carry your insurance card.

entry_authorization.headline: ESTA (Electronic System for Travel Authorization) required for Visa Waiver Program countries.
entry_authorization.details: Apply online at least 72 hours before travel. Valid for 2 years or until passport expires.
entry_authorization.validity: Multiple entries for up to 2 years.

passport_validity.rule: Passport must be valid for 6 months beyond intended stay.

notes: ESTA does not guarantee entry - CBP officer makes final decision.
Business activities limited to meetings, conferences, negotiations - no paid work.

entry_authorization.headline: B-1 Business Visa required for non-VWP countries.
entry_authorization.details: Schedule interview at US Embassy/Consulate. Processing times vary by location (2-8 weeks typical).
entry_authorization.validity: Usually issued for 10 years with multiple entries.

passport_validity.rule: Passport must be valid for 6 months beyond intended stay.

notes: Allow extra time for visa processing.

entry_authorization.headline: UK Electronic Travel Authorisation (ETA) required for visa-exempt nationals.
entry_authorization.details: Apply via GOV.UK or the UK ETA app. Most decisions in ~3 working days; apply early.
entry_authorization.validity: Multiple entries up to 2 years or until passport expiry (whichever is sooner).

passport_validity.rule: Passport must be valid for the duration of stay.

notes: ETA is required even if transiting through the UK.

entry_authorization.headline: No visa required for EU/EEA nationals for short business visits.
entry_authorization.details: Present valid passport or national ID at border. No pre-authorization needed.

passport_validity.rule: Passport or national ID must be valid for the duration of stay.

required_documents: Valid passport or national ID card
notes: Cannot work or access public funds during visit.

sources.title: Visit the UK as an EU citizen

entry_authorization.headline: US citizens do not need an eTA or visa for Canada.
entry_authorization.details: Present valid US passport at border. Entry granted at border officer's discretion.

passport_validity.rule: Passport must be valid for the duration of stay.

notes: NEXUS card holders can use expedited lanes.

entry_authorization.headline: Electronic Travel Authorization (eTA) required for visa-exempt travelers flying to Canada.
entry_authorization.details: Apply online. Most applications approved within minutes.
entry_authorization.validity: Valid for 5 years or until passport expires.

passport_validity.rule: Passport must be valid for the duration of stay.

notes: eTA not needed if entering by land or sea from the US.

entry_authorization.headline: No visa required for short-term business visits (Schengen Area).
entry_authorization.details: Up to 90 days within any 180-day period across the entire Schengen Area.

passport_validity.rule: Passport must be valid for at least 3 months beyond planned departure from Schengen area.

required_documents: Proof of travel insurance (30,000 EUR coverage)
notes: 90-day limit applies across all Schengen countries combined.

entry_authorization.headline: No visa required for short-term business visits.
entry_authorization.details: Present valid passport at immigration. Complete arrival card and customs declaration.

passport_validity.rule: Passport must be valid for the duration of stay.

notes: Visit Japan Web registration recommended for faster entry.
No paid work permitted on visa-free entry.

entry_authorization.headline: No visa required for US, Canadian, Australian, and Japanese citizens.
entry_authorization.details: Visa exemption for tourism and business visits up to 90 days.
entry_authorization.validity: 90 days, extendable to 180 days per year.

passport_validity.rule: Passport must be valid for at least 6 months.

recommended_documents: Yellow fever vaccination certificate (if traveling from affected areas)
notes: Yellow fever vaccination may be required depending on origin.
Register with Federal Police if staying over 90 days.
